title: All the Backlist! November 9, 2018
description:
This week, Liberty discusses a few great older books, including The Night Guest.
This week’s episode was sponsored by Book Riot Insiders and Frankie by Shivaun Plozza.
Subscribe to All the Books! using RSS or Apple Podcasts and never miss a beat book.
Sign up for the weekly New Books! newsletter for even more new book news.
This content contains affiliate links. When you buy through these links, we may earn an affiliate commission.

Books discussed on the show:
Fly By Night by Frances Hardinge
The Queen of the Night by Alexander Chee
The Last Days of Night by Graham Moore
The Sherlockian by Graham Moore
The Night Guest by Fiona McFarlane
The Night in Question: Stories by Tobias Wolff
The Book of Night Women by Marlon James
Norwegian by Night by Derek B. Miller
Night at the Fiestas: Stories by Kirstin Valdez Quade
On the Come Up by Angie Thomas
Liar by Justine Larbalestier
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
